original_text: If there remain but a few years until the year of jubilee, he shall calculate and pay for his redemption in proportion to his years of service.
korean_text: 만일 희년까지 남은 해가 적으면 그 사람과 계산하여 그 연수대로 속량하는 그 값을 그에게 도로 줄지며

sentences.original_text: If there remain but a few years until the year of jubilee
he shall calculate and pay for his redemption
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 속전을 계산하고 지불해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: in proportion to his years of service
